org.red5.server.net.remoting

Interface IRemotingCallback


  • public interface IRemotingCallback
    Callback for asynchronous remoting calls.
    Author:
    The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Joachim Bauch (jojo@struktur.de)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void errorReceived(RemotingClient client, String method, Object[] params, Throwable error)
      An error occured while performing the remoting call.
      void resultReceived(RemotingClient client, String method, Object[] params, Object result)
      The result of a remoting call has been received.

    • Method Detail

      • resultReceived

        void resultReceived(RemotingClient client,
                  String method,
                  Object[] params,
                  Object result)
        The result of a remoting call has been received.
        Parameters:
        client - Remoting client
        method - Remote method name
        params - Call parameters
        result - Call result

                 Object[] params,

        An error occured while performing the remoting call.
        Parameters:
        client - Remoting client

        params - Call parameters
        error - Call result
